semantic_identifier: [GOLD-122]: Add in-product bypass tracking for key Sales_Accelerator workflows
title: Add in-product bypass tracking for key Sales_Accelerator workflows

sections.text: Instrument core user flows (best-next-action, forecasting updates, risk alerts) to detect and log when users bypass Sales_Accelerator and complete the action directly in the CRM or outside the product. Capture event metadata (user/team, account/opportunity, workflow type, timestamp, UI entry point, and stated/implicit reason where available) to quantify organizational drift. Ensure events are emitted consistently from web and extension surfaces and are available for downstream reporting and future interventions.
